question: As per US State Department's 2018 Trafficking in Persons Report, which country has been tagged "worst human trafficking nation"?
explanation: As per US State Department\'s 2018 Trafficking in Persons Report, North Korea has been tagged \"worst human trafficking nation\" for the 16th straight year, citing the use of forced labour. North Korea has been included in the Tier 3 category, which is the lowest ranking, along with China, Russia and Iran. The report stated that the North Korean government does not fully meet the minimum standards for the elimination of trafficking and is not making significant efforts to do so. It is continued to use forced labour in prison camps and labour training centres. In a stark contrast, South Korea has been ranked at the highest category, that is, in the list of Tier 1 countries for the 16th consecutive year, along with US, UK, France and Canada.
